snippet.title: Infinity Blade: iPhone Trailer
snippet.description:
Epic's Unreal powered fighter fills your iPhone, iPad, and iPod with bloody brutes in Infinity Blade. Check out the awesome gameplay and visuals.

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
